Row.Text: I...I guess you were a big guy for me. Has this started your fire?
Dr. Leader, I'm CIA.
Dr. {1_Name}, I'm CIA.
Hello again, biggest guy in the world.
Who paid you to grab my heart? [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]
Spain?
Did you see Maimen or Juan when you walked out here? I can't seem to find them, but they're on my flight plan.
You don't get to stay on my aircraft.
Tell me about you! Why are you such an ass?!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Crashing my plane with no survivors? We'll see about that!
Was getting denounced part of your plan?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: Now's not the time for fear; that comes later.[ENDCOLOR])
There he is. There he goes again. Look, everyone! He denounced me once again! Isn't he just the funniest guy around?! Oh my God.
Tell me about my people! Why are they buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music?![NEWLINE]A lot of cultural influence for a hired gun!
I'm about to crash your Civilization with no survivors!
Perhaps you're wondering why I would shoot a man before throwing him out of a plane? My response is: why not do both at once?
If I capture your Capital, wil you die?
I'm about to crash your Civilization with no survivors!
Perhaps you're wondering why I would shoot a man before throwing him out of a plane? My response is: why not do both at once?
If I capture your Capital, wil you die?
Is it time to repost this? I've only seen 20 threads on it today.
...get 'em on board, I'll call it in.
Thanks. You're a big guy.
Thanks. You're a big guy.
Well congratulations, you got yourself beaten! Now, what's the next step of your master plan?
This can't be happening! I'm in charge here!
If I capture your Capital, wil you die?
And why would I want that?
And why would I want that?
Your military is full of big guys. For every one of our planes, you could leave behind 10 people in the wreckage, brother.
Lotta money for a hired Leader!
You're a small guy.
Tell me about you! Why do you raze the cities?!
Friends with {1_CivName}? You get to bring them on my plane.
{1_CivName}? They are not my friends.
Uhh...you get to bring friends. Like me, right?
The war plan I just filed with the agency lists me, you, {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}, and exactly none of anybody else! Assist me, and you get to stay on my aircraft!
Someone get this hothead outta here!
Hothead pls go
REMOVE HOTHEAD FROM PREMISES.
Was sucking dick part of your plan?
Bane?
Was getting caught part of your plan?
Was getting caught part of your plan?
It...wasn't? Well...hmm.
Well, congratulations, you got yourself caught! Now, what's the next step of your master plan?
